title: Support Site Issue, Missing Tickets
body:
Hi, my main account was recently hacked. I attempted to reach out to your support site, however the tickets I made do not appear to work. I was emailed the ticket numbers along with the links to view them. Upon trying to view them, I get _Opps, the page you are looking for does not exist_. It has been three days since I made the first ticket. I don't understand why I can't view it unless there is something wrong with the support site. My ticket numbers are #23596233 and #23620276. The second ticket, #23620276, has the updated info as requested by the support site. I made the account in season 4 or 3, which I know is not really too long technically, but I put a lot of work into my account. I just need to know that the tickets are being worked on and workable. I hate sitting on my hands.

Thank You

replies.body: I looked into this for you and verified that all your tickets have been received.  If you aren't able to login to the support site to view your tickets, don't worry!  Any correspondence we have can be viewed and replied through email updates.  You will receive an email as soon we our account team responds to your ticket, which you can reply to.  You're currently in queue for our account team to dig into this.  We'll respond as soon as we can!
